document.full_text: thai and cambodia troops fought with short-range rockets and guns near 900-year-old preah vihear temple on tuesday, opening a second front in a five-day confrontation that has killed 13 people in southeast asia's bloodiest border dispute in years.
document.title: thai and cambodian troops exchange fire near ancient temple
lines_and_colors: thai and cambodia troops fought with short-range rockets and guns near 900-year-old preah vihear temple on tuesday, opening a second front in a five-day confrontation that has killed 13 people in southeast asia's bloodiest border dispute in years.
